revision.text: ==Maltese== {{mt-root|x-r-b}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|mt|ar|شَرِبَ}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|mt|/ˈʃɔ.rɔp/}} ===Verb=== {{mt-verb|jixrob|mixrub|vn=xarb|vn2=xrib|vn3=xorb}} # to [[drink]] # to [[absorb]] (physically or mentally) # to [[do]] something [[quickly]] # to [[cause]] [[illness]] as a result of the [[evil eye]] ====Conjugation==== {{mt-conj |1=xrobt |2=xrobt |3=xorob |4=xorbot |5=xrobna |6=xrobtu |7=xorbu |8=nixrob |9=tixrob |10=jixrob |11=tixrob |12=nixorbu |13=tixorbu |14=jixorbu |15=ixrob |16=ixorbu }}
